description: Noun of action form, from verb divagate (from the Latin verb divagare) + noun of action suffix -ion (from the Latin suffix -io).

nouns.description: Noun of action form, from verb divagate (from the Latin verb divagare) + noun of action suffix -ion (from the Latin suffix -io).

entries.meaning: Straying off from a course or way.
(medicine) Incoherent or wandering speech and thought.
